title: time banned why do i have to wait 20 mins every game that i try to star t
body: why do i have to wait 20 mins every game so I can play

replies.body:
If you leave or disconnect from multiple games in a row, you can be hit with what's called a low priority queue by our Leaverbuster. We do this in an effort to prevent players from dodging matches and leaving their teammates with only 4 members to fight against a full team of 5.

You can use our [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) to read up on all the details.
